institutions.registerTempTable("institutions")

    "peoples r china" -> "china",
    "north ireland" -> "united kingdom",
    "cote ivoire" -> "ivory coast",
    "bosnia & herceg" -> "bosnia and herzegovina",
    "u arab emirates" -> "united arab emirates",
    "papua n guinea" -> "papua new guinea",
    "rep of georgia" -> "georgia",

    "fr polynesia" -> "french polynesia",

paragraphs.title: GeoNames maps
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row

val countriesMap = sc.broadcast(countries.select('name, 'country_geoname_id).map(r => clean(r.getString(0)) -> r.getInt(1)).collect().toMap)

val countryCityState = cities2.join(
    countries, 'country_iso === 'iso
).select(
    'country_geoname_id, 'algo_city_name, 'algo_city_alternate_names, 'algo_state, 'city_geoname_id
).map { r =>
    val cityName = r.getString(1)
    val countryId = if (cityName != "hong kong") r.getInt(0) else 1814991 // Hong Kong as a part of China
    val cityAlternateNames = r.getSeq[String](2)
    val state = r.getString(3)
    val cityId = r.getInt(4)
    
    (countryId, cityName, cityAlternateNames, state) -> collection.mutable.Set(cityId)
}

val citiesMap = sc.broadcast(countryCityState.map { case ((countryId, cityName, _, _), cityIds) =>
    (countryId, cityName) -> cityIds
}.reduceByKey(_ ++= _).collect().toMap)

val citiesAlternateMap = sc.broadcast(countryCityState.flatMap { case ((countryId, _, cityAlternateNames, _), cityIds) =>
    cityAlternateNames.map(n => (countryId, n) -> cityIds)
}.reduceByKey(_ ++= _).collect().toMap)

val statesMap = sc.broadcast(countryCityState.map { case ((countryId, cityName, _, state), cityIds) =>
    (countryId, cityName, state) -> cityIds
}.reduceByKey(_ ++= _).collect().toMap)

val statesAlternateMap = sc.broadcast(countryCityState.flatMap { case ((countryId, _, cityAlternateNames, state), cityIds) =>
    cityAlternateNames.map(n => (countryId, n, state) -> cityIds)
}.reduceByKey(_ ++= _).collect().toMap)

paragraphs.text:
case class Extracted(
    block0: String,
    block1: String,
    block2: Option[String],
    //
    text0: Option[String],
    text1: Option[String],
    text2: Option[String],
    //
    country: Option[String],
    state: Option[String],
    city1: Option[String],
    city2: Option[String],
    //
    countryId: Option[Int],
    cityIds: Option[Seq[Int]],
    //
    isIdentified: Boolean,
    isAmbiguous: Boolean)

result.msg: defined class Extracted

paragraphs.title: GeoNames city matching algorithm
paragraphs.text:
val text = "(?<=^| )[a-z &]+(?= |$)".r
val usState = "^([a-z]{2})( [0-9]{5})? usa$".r
val nlPostalCode = """^nl\-[0-9]{4} [a-z]{2} ([a-z]+)$""".r
val dkCityName = "^(.*) [a-z]{1}$".r

def auStateName(s: String): Option[String] = stateNameMapping.value.get(s)

def identifyCity(blocks: Seq[String]): Extracted = {
    val parts = blocks.reverse
    
    val block0 = parts(0)
    val block1 = parts(1)
    val block2 = parts.lift(2)
    
    val text0 = text.findFirstIn(block0)
    val text1 = text.findFirstIn(block1)
    val text2 = block2.map(b2 => text.findFirstIn(b2)).flatten
    
    var country: Option[String] = None
    var state: Option[String] = None
    var city1: Option[String] = None
    var city2: Option[String] = None
    
    var countryId: Option[Int] = None
    var auState: Boolean = false
    
    val cityIds =
        text0.map(properCountryName).map { t0 =>
            country = Some(t0)
            val countries = countriesMap.value
            countries.get(t0) orElse
            usState.findFirstMatchIn(block0).map { o => state = Some(o.group(1)); country = Some("united states"); 6252001 } orElse
            ukStatesMap.value.get(t0).map { s => state = Some(s); country = Some("united kingdom"); 2635167 }
        }.flatten.map { cid =>
            countryId = Some(cid)
            text1.map(properCityName).map { t1 =>
                city1 = Some(t1)
                val cities = citiesMap.value
                val states = statesMap.value
                val cities2 = citiesAlternateMap.value
                val states2 = statesAlternateMap.value
                state.map(s => states.get((cid, t1, s)) orElse states2.get((cid, t1, s))).flatten orElse
                text2.map(properCityName).map { t2 =>
                    city2 = Some(t2)
                    auStateName(t1).map { s => state = Some(s); auState = true }
                    state.map(s => states.get((cid, t2, s)) orElse states2.get((cid, t2, s))).flatten orElse
                    cities.get((cid, t2)) orElse cities2.get((cid, t2)) orElse
                    (states.get((cid, t2, t1)) orElse states2.get((cid, t2, t1))).map { ids => state = Some(t1); ids } orElse
                    (states.get((cid, t1, t2)) orElse states2.get((cid, t1, t2))).map { ids => city2 = city1; state = Some(t2); ids }
                }.flatten orElse
                {
                    city1 =
                        nlPostalCode.findFirstMatchIn(block1).map(_.group(1)) orElse
                        dkCityName.findFirstMatchIn(t1).map(_.group(1)) orElse
                        (if (auState) city2 else city1)
                    cities.get((cid, city1.get)) orElse cities2.get((cid, city1.get))
                }
            }.flatten
        }.flatten
    
    val cityIdsSize = cityIds.map(_.size).getOrElse(0)
    val isIdentified = cityIdsSize == 1
    val isAmbiguous = cityIdsSize > 1
    
    Extracted(block0, block1, block2, text0, text1, text2, country, state, city1, city2, countryId, cityIds.map(_.toSeq), isIdentified, isAmbiguous)
}

result.msg:
text: scala.util.matching.Regex = (?<=^| )[a-z &]+(?= |$)
usState: scala.util.matching.Regex = ^([a-z]{2})( [0-9]{5})? usa$
nlPostalCode: scala.util.matching.Regex = ^nl\-[0-9]{4} [a-z]{2} ([a-z]+)$
dkCityName: scala.util.matching.Regex = ^(.*) [a-z]{1}$
auStateName: (s: String)Option[String]
identifyCity: (blocks: Seq[String])Extracted

paragraphs.title: Known city identification issues
paragraphs.text:
%md

##### ambiguous
Can't be safely disambiguated without more information (ex: 'Univ Childrens Hosp, Munster, Germany').
GeoNames postal codes from alternateNames.txt seem not to be correct (ex: 'D-79104 Freiburg, Germany').

##### no country
'AN (the Netherlands Antilles) with geonameId = 3513447  was dissolved on 10 October 2010'

##### no city
- city contains abbreviation(s) not yet expanded
- city has spelling mistakes
- city in allCountries.txt
- only county (no city)
- not in GeoNames

result.msg:
ambiguous

Can't be safely disambiguated without more information (ex: 'Univ Childrens Hosp, Munster, Germany').
GeoNames postal codes from alternateNames.txt seem not to be correct (ex: 'D-79104 Freiburg, Germany').

no country

'AN (the Netherlands Antilles) with geonameId = 3513447 was dissolved on 10 October 2010'

no city
  • city contains abbreviation(s) not yet expanded
  • city has spelling mistakes
  • city in allCountries.txt
  • only county (no city)
  • not in GeoNames

paragraphs.text: extracted.values.toDF().persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER).registerTempTable("extracted")

%sql
select count(*) c, countryId, country, state, city1, city2
from extracted
where cityIds is null
group by countryId, country, state, city1, city2
order by c, countryId, state, city1, city2 desc
limit 8

paragraphs.title: Institutions3

result.msg:
identified: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [algo_geo_id: bigint, city_geoname_id: int]
institutions3: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [pub_id: bigint, idx: smallint, address: string, enhanced_names: array<string>, city_geoname_id: int]

paragraphs.title: Sanity checks
paragraphs.text:
/*
- no institution lost
*/

assert(institutions3.count() == institutions.count())

paragraphs.title: Write
paragraphs.text: OptSaveMode.foreach(institutions3.write.mode(_).parquet(s"$DisambigDir/geonames_city_identified_institutions-did_$DatasetId.parquet"))
institutions3.show()
